metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14648 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in 389 Directory Server. A specially crafted search query could lead to excessive CPU consumption in the do_search() function. An unauthenticated attacker could use this flaw to provoke a denial of service.

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.0.18-1').
